tags.name: HelpTicketsResponses
tags.description: Operations related to help tickets reponses

get.summary: Get all items in a user's cart
get.description: Retrieve all items currently in a specific user's cart.

404.description: User not found or cart is empty.

post.summary: Add an item to a user's cart
post.description: Add a new item to the cart for a specific user.

productId.description: Unique identifier of the product to be added to the cart.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product to add to the cart.

201.description: Item added to the cart successfully.

400.description: Invalid input or missing required fields.

404.description: User or product not found, or invalid size.

delete.summary: Clear all items from a user's cart
delete.description: Remove all items from the cart for a specific user.

200.description: All items removed from the cart successfully.

404.description: No items found in the cart for the given user.

put.summary: Update the quantity of a cart item
put.description: Modify the quantity of a cart item using its unique cart item ID. If the quantity is set to 0, the item will be removed from the cart.

parameters.name: cartItemId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the cart item.

200.description: Cart item updated successfully or removed if quantity is 0.

404.description: User or cart item not found.

delete.summary: Remove an item from a user's cart
delete.description: Delete a specific item from a user's cart using its unique cart item ID.

parameters.name: cartItemId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the cart item to delete.

404.description: Cart item not found for the given user.

get.summary: Retrieve all responses for a specific help ticket
get.description: Fetch all responses associated with a given help ticket by its ID.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the help ticket.

200.description: Successfully retrieved all responses for the specified help ticket.

404.description: No responses found for the specified help ticket.

post.summary: Add a response to a specific help ticket
post.description: Submit a response to an existing help ticket by specifying the user ID and ticket ID in the URL.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the help ticket.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the user submitting the response.

response.description: The content of the response to be added to the help ticket.
response.example: Thank you for your patience. We are working on resolving the issue.

201.description: Response added to the help ticket successfully.

400.description: Invalid input or missing required field(s).

404.description: Help ticket or user not found.

get.description: Get a list of all help tickets in the system.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of help tickets.

get.summary: Retrieve help tickets of a specific user
get.description: Fetch all help tickets submitted by a specific user identified by userId.

200.description: Successfully retrieved help tickets for the user.

404.description: User not found or no help tickets exist for the user.

post.summary: Create a new help ticket for a user
post.description: Submit a new help ticket to the system for a specific user identified by their userId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user submitting the help ticket.

subject.description: The subject of the help ticket.

description.description: A detailed description of the issue or request.

400.description: Invalid input or missing required fields.

404.description: User not found.

get.summary: Retrieve details of a specific help ticket
get.description: Fetch details of a specific help ticket by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the help ticket.

404.description: Help ticket not found.

put.description: Update details of a help ticket by its ID, such as its status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the help ticket.

status.description: The updated status of the help ticket.

400.description: Invalid input or missing required fields.

404.description: Help ticket not found.

delete.description: Remove a help ticket from the system by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the help ticket.

404.description: Help ticket not found.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the order to delete.

get.summary: Retrieve preferences of a specific user
get.description: Fetch the preferences of a user by their unique ID.

404.description: Preferences not found for the given user ID.

put.description: Modify the preferences of a specific user by their ID.

receiveNotification.description: Whether the user wants to receive notifications.

newsLetter.description: Whether the user wants to subscribe to newsletters.
